entries.title: Live Stock Market Dashboard
entries.description: Develops a comprehensive stock dashboard, designed to provide users with real-time stock data and technical analysis.

entries.title: Option Pricing Analytics
entries.description: Delivers platform for options pricing, Greeks analysis, and risk management, offering an intuitive interface for financial derivatives analysis.

entries.title: Business Valuation Simulator
entries.description: Develops a business valuation tool that calculates the enterprise value of a company based on various parameters like revenue, assets, growth rate, and margin.
